pages.title: Phantom
pages.text: Phantoms are a manifestation of insomnia. It is said they thrive in the End, making the exploration of Outter Islands a very dangerous task. Phantoms drop a Membrane on death, which can be used to repair Elytras.

pages.name: Phantom
pages.text: Using a potion of Insomnia on a Phantom will transform it into a Flare.
